description: Discover the best hotels in Central Coast, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Modern Central Coast Escape Just 90 Minutes From Sydney near Tuggerah Lake with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Central Coast escapes don’t get much sweeter than this. Kick back and enjoy the region’s abundance of beaches, restaurants and bars with a stay at Encore by Mingara, conveniently located just a short drive from the tranquil shores of Tuggerah Lake and the spectacular Wyrrabalong National Park. Check out local highlights including ocean pools, weekend markets, walking and cycling tracks; before your adventures, fuel up with a la carte breakfast at The Roasted Berry, then return to a menu of modern Australian favourites at Hadley's or Australian-Chinese fare at Ming Dragon. Access state-of-the-art fitness centre One by Mingara, including a heated indoor pool, athletic track and group fitness classes including yoga, pilates and more.

hotels.title: Hamptons-Style Central Coast Getaway with Waterfront Bar & Pool
hotels.description: Escape from Sydney to a coastal haven just 90 minutes away, soaking up sun at The Beachcomber Hotel & Resort. Slip into holiday mode at this bright and vibrant waterfront locale that rivals a Hamptons holiday home. Take in sparkling views of Budgewoi Lake from the Club Cyan bar or one of the many cabanas surrounding the heated deckside pool, and indulge your way all day at The Beachie Pub, Bar & Grill which features a menu of elevated pub classics.

seo.title: Hotels in Central Coast - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Central Coast, Australia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
